title: Leo Cotte
text: Leovigildo "Leo" Cotte is a <a href="Puerto%20Rican%20people">Puerto Rican</a> politician and former mayor of <a href="Lajas%2C%20Puerto%20Rico">Lajas</a>. Cotte is affiliated with the <a href="New%20Progressive%20Party%20of%20Puerto%20Rico">New Progressive Party</a> (PNP) and served as mayor from 2009 to 2013.
